sentences.sentence: Colonoscopic views of diverticula are seen here.
Objective: To discuss the value of MSCT in diagnosis of duodenal diverticula.
sentences.translation: 前言：目的：探讨m SCT对十二指肠憩室的诊断价值。

sentences.sentence: The epithelium of digestive diverticula consists of secretory cells and digestive (absorptive) cells.
sentences.translation: 消化盲囊的腺上皮由分泌细胞和消化(吸收)细胞组成。
